snippet: A Marxist extremist group that took responsibility for a suicide bombing in Istanbul this week retracted its claim on Friday, saying that it had made a mistake.
abstract: Turkey's Revolutionary People’s Liberation Party retracts its claim taking responsibility for suicide bombing at police station in Istanbul's tourist district.
lead_paragraph: A Marxist extremist group that took responsibility for a suicide bombing in Istanbul this week retracted its claim on Friday, saying that it had made a mistake.

headline.main: Turkey: Leftists Retract Their Claim About an Attack
headline.print_headline: Turkey: Leftists Retract Their Claim About an Attack
